summary: This appears to be a diversion report and acceptance letter regarding Michael Thomas, sent by a United States Pretrial Officer in the Southern District of New York. It suggests some form of pretrial diversion program involvement.

keyFacts: A diversion report and acceptance letter exists for an individual named Michael Thomas.
The document is associated with the United States Pretrial Services in the Southern District of New York.
The communication was sent on May 18, 2021.
